summary: In this Q&A, we reported on our recommendations to Congress—our "matters for congressional consideration." Since 2000, we've recommended that Congress consider over 1,000 of these matters to save money and improve federal programs. Congress has acted on 80% of them. As of March 2024, 242 matters remained open. For example, in 2018, we recommended requiring electronically prepared tax returns that are filed on paper to...
title: Recommendations for Congress: Action Can Produce Billions of Dollars in Financial and Other Benefits
